item.title: it@cork Leaders Award Nominations Open
item.description: Make your nominations in the following categories: High Potential Start-Up award – recognises a leading company in early stage business planning and execution; High Growth Company award – recognises a leading established company driving forward in international markets; Sustained Excellence award – recognises an established company with a record of consistent growth and profitability R&D Project award recognises a leading innovative technology research project within industry or third level college; IT Department award recognises an IT department that can clearly demonstrate business benefit from IT project implementations; Green Technology award recognises a company that has implemented or developed technology solutions to achieve reductions in energy use Excellence in Education award – recognises the efforts of an individual, group or school to engage with technology for education purposes.
